title: New: Jack Garratt – I Couldn't Want You Anyway
body:
I’m a sucker for this style of music.

Granted, it’s all the rage right now, I believe it’s viewed as ‘alternative R&B’, and, if done well, can be as emotionally hard-hitting as anything around. London’s **Jack Garratt** nails it on his debut track,_ I Couldn’t Want You Anyway_, a gorgeous vocal led composition, reciting an oft-repeated story of lost love and ill-gifted chances. Check it out below, not recommended if you’re already in a weepy mood.
